column5: Apply for this programmeDevelop your understanding of economic concepts and policies that promote world agricultural development with our MSc Agriculture Economics master’s degree.With an ever-increasing world population and growing pressure on the world’s finite resources, the analytical skills of agricultural economists are more relevant than ever.Choose MSc Agriculture Economics at the University of ReadingYou will:
column7: New UK/Republic of Ireland students: £10,800  New international students: £22,350
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
